data.name: Darxwift
data.detailed_description:
The world is plagued by an incurable infection that turns humans into aggressive creatures. The remnants of the human survivors have settled in vast underground shelters. One day your shelter was also swallowed up by the infection. The place is no longer safe, so you must get out while you can.

Look for supplies!


The underground shelter consists of many floors with different rooms filled with different supplies. To survive and get to the top, you have to search for various supplies - weapons, ammo, medical supplies, keycards, access codes, crafting materials, and more.

Fight the aggressive creatures!


The floors of the shelter are teeming with aggressive creatures that hunger for human flesh. Fight for your life by all means, using an arsenal of various melee and firearms.

Get to the end!


Each new game is unique in its own way. The floors of the shelter, the layout of the different rooms, and the supplies are randomly generated each time. Get to the end!

data.short_description: Look for supplies, fight monsters, and try to get out of the infected underground shelter before time runs out!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i3 and up
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 and up
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 and up
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1650 and up
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
